IN THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- Til
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI
Wednesday 19" day of February 2025
ST No. 3551/2016

Complainant : State of Kerala represented by Dr. P-YJohn, Drugs
Inspector (Ayurveda), Office of the Deputy Drugs
Controller (ASU), Arogyabhavan, Thiruvananthapuram
â€”1.

Accused 1 : M/s. Francis Vaidyans Ayurveda Vaidyasala Pvt. Ltd,
Parappuram, Kuzhoor P.O., Mala, Thrissur.

2 : Francis Paul, aged 46 years, S/o Paul, residing at
Kandamkuthy House, Parappuram, Kuzhoor P.O., Mala,
Thrissur, PIN- 686669 (Director & Licensee of M/s.
Francis Vaidyans Ayurveda Vaidyasala Pvt. Ltd,
Parappuram, Kuzhoor P.O., Mala, Thrissur.)

(By Adv. Sri. Santosh Daniel.S)

Offence : U/S. 7(a) of Drugs and Magic Remedies (Objectionable
Advertisement) Act,1954.

Order : Accused nos. 1 and 2 are convicted and sentenced to
pay a fine of Rs. 5,000/- each. In default of payment of
fine accused nos. 1 and 2 shall undergo simple
imprisonment for 3 months each for offence punishable
ws. 7(a) of Drugs and Magic Remedies (Objectionable
Advertisement) Act,1954.

Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT
1. Accused stand trial for offence punishable w/s. 7(a) of Drugs and Magic

Remedies (Objectionable Advertisement) Act,1954.

2. Accused nos. 1 and 2 appeared through counsel. Accused nos. 1 and 2

pleaded guilty through counsel. Accused nos. 1 and 2 are found guilty. Accused
nos. 1 and 2 are convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of Rs. 5,000/- each. In
default of payment of fine accused nos.1 and 2 shall undergo simple
imprisonment for 3 months each for offence punishable u/s. 7(a) of Drugs and
Magic Remedies (Objectionable Advertisement) Act,1954.
(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 19" day of February, 2025.)
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- III
Thiruvananthapuram
